name: Accounting Apps | Cloud Accounting
what_you_do: Heather Smith hosts the Accounting Apps podcast, which showcases in-depth interviews with cloud enthusiasts and appaholics, exploring the intersections of accounting, technology, and modern practice methodologies.
who_you_serve: The podcast serves entrepreneurs, business consultants, accountants, bookkeepers, and small business owners interested in leveraging technology for better business practices.
bio: The podcast has achieved over 145,000 downloads and is notable for being one of the few in its niche hosted by a woman.
business_focus: Heather Smith hosts the Accounting Apps podcast, which showcases in-depth interviews with cloud enthusiasts and appaholics, exploring the intersections of accounting, technology, and modern practice methodologies.
